game.name: Water Boiling Simulator
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: It's 2016. Explore through your house in the middle of the night and complete your chores before the water you put on the stove starts boiling. Sounds easy, right? If only you hadn't seen things you were not supposed to see.
